ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides functions to perform reproducible parallel foreach loops, using independent random streams as generated by L'Ecuyer's combined multiple-recursive generator [L'Ecuyer (1999), <DOI:10.1287/opre.47.1.159>]. It enables to easily convert standard %dopar% loops into fully reproducible loops, independently of the number of workers, the task scheduling strategy, or the chosen parallel environment and associated foreach backend.

Provides functions to perform reproducible parallel foreach loops, using independent random streams as generated by L'Ecuyer's combined multiple-recursive generator [L'Ecuyer (1999), <DOI:10.1287/opre.47.1.159>]. It enables to easily convert standard %dopar% loops into fully reproducible loops, independently of the number of workers, the task scheduling strategy, or the chosen parallel environment and associated foreach backend.

name: r-dorng
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.8.6.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dorng
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/doRNG_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/doRNG/doRNG_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7a5db1806f3529e2e60f49921790b3bbca7ebcedc7301627a1a404b4fe251d51

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-foreach
    - r-iterators
    - r-rngtools >=1.5
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-foreach
    - r-iterators
    - r-rngtools >=1.5

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('doRNG')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('doRNG')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://renozao.github.io/doRNG
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides functions to perform reproducible parallel foreach loops, using independent random streams as generated by L'Ecuyer's combined multiple-recursive generator [L'Ecuyer (1999), <DOI:10.1287/opre.47.1.159>]. It enables to easily convert standard %dopar% loops into fully reproducible loops, independently
    of the number of workers, the task scheduling strategy, or the chosen parallel environment and associated foreach backend.
  license_family: GPL
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
